name: Sweet Dreams (green0range)
description:
You child is asleep, dreaming about being in space. Suddenly a strange creature appears in their dreams. They don't know what it is. They don't understand. They are scared. You explain that it is a spider-fish. They are reassured and the nightmare passes.

In this game, you must correctly identify the animal amalgamations that make up your child's nightmare.

This game was created for a 72 hour game jam with the theme "Dreamy"
